entry.title: $2699 // Updated kitchen with high end appliances, new bathroom
entry.content:
New to the market is the beautifully renovated one bedroom apartment in Chelsea! This apartment features hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances and laundry in the building. Just one flight up in a beautiful maintained renovated walk up. Call today - tour today!

239 Ninth Avenue
New York City, NY

Apartment #: A
Bed: 1
Bath: 1
Price: $2,699

NO FEE***PETS WELCOME***GUARANTORS OK***OWNER MANAGED**NO FEE*** BRAND NEW RENOVATED NO FEE JUNIOR ONE BEDROOM!!! ALL STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES!!! DISHWASHER!!! LAUNDRY IN BUILDING!!! In West Chelsea on 9th avenue, the building is fully renovated and this is a brand new on the market. All new finishes, updated kitchen with high end appliances, new bathroom. Owner managed and pet friendly, steps from the High Line! Email us now for a tour!

U.S. Guarantors Accepted.

Phone: 646-758-0347
Web: www.aimconyc.com

Price and availability are subject to change.
Equal Housing Opportunity
Professionally Managed by OP Property Management, LLC
